author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS FURTHER AS RAINBANDS AFFECT PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS FURTHER AS RAINBANDS AFFECT PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 17.4, -105.9 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE STRENGTHENS FURTHER AS RAINBANDS AFFECT PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF MEXICO... As of 9:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 17.4, -105.9 with movement NW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
